course_description: Start your coding journey with Python! This beginner-friendly course teaches core programming concepts through hands-on exercises and real-world examples, preparing you for further studies in software development, data science, or automation.
course_overview: This comprehensive course introduces learners to the fundamentals of Python programming, one of the most versatile and in-demand programming languages today. Topics include variables, data types, control structures, functions, file handling, and basic error handling. Through interactive coding exercises and guided projects, students will build a strong foundation for future learning in software development, data analysis, and automation. The course emphasizes practical skills and problem-solving techniques essential for success in tech-related fields.
target_audience: Beginners with little to no programming experience who want to learn Python for career advancement or personal projects.
prerequisites: Familiarity with using a web browser and text editor
learning_outcomes: Define and use variables, data types, and operators in Python
Construct control flow statements using conditionals and loops
Create and use functions to organize and reuse code
Read from and write to files using Python's file handling capabilities
Debug simple programs using error messages and print statements
Solve basic programming problems using algorithmic thinking
